title.@value: Common arterial trunk with pulmonary dominance and interrupted aortic arch

definition.@value: A congenital cardiovascular malformation in which a common arterial trunk is associated with an interrupted aortic arch.

label.@value: Common arterial trunk with pulmonary dominance and interrupted aortic arch
Truncus arteriosus with pulmonary dominance and interrupted aortic arch

Van Praagh truncus arteriosus type A4
